page.title: 10A Redlynch Summer Day
page.content: On Saturday morning I went riding in the New Forest with my family.I managed to get three canters out of Snowy.I was very puffed out so I went in the woods to catch my breath. In the afternoon I went to Lottie's house.We played in the wood and found a little den.We made a little front room out of a rhododendron bush.There were bedrooms and everything you have in a real house. We took off our shoes and we played in the house. Lottie's Mum drove me home.We played in the long grass in my garden.My great auntie has a house in the garden.She is having an extension built.Lottie went home and we had tea.I watched television and ate my three sweets.I read a funny book to Mummy.Daddy read to me before I went to bed.
